attributes.action: Provide Covid19 Test Centers in northumberland
attributes.background: I would like the government/parliment to see this as high importance for single lone parents non drivers that can not travel 83 mile to the nearest test centers

rejection.details: Since you started your petition it has been announced that Covid testing centres are to open in Ashington and Blyth. You can find out more here: https://www.northumberland.gov.uk/News/2020/Sep/Northumberland-s-first-local-COVID-testing-centres.aspx
